definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: spoil, plunder (Ar. baz=a, Aram. baz; Amhar. bahabaha: perh. Eth. bezawa: rescue Prä:BAS i. 33)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[וּבָזַז]] (consec.) Ez Eze 29:19; 3 pl. [[בָּֽזְַזוּ]] Nu 31:53 + 7 t.; [[בָּזׇ֑זוּ]] Nu 31:9; sf. [[וּבְזׇזוּם]] consec. Je 20:5; 1 pl. [[בָּזַזְנוּ]] De 2:35; [[בַּזּוֹנוּ]] De 3:7; Impf. 2 ms. [[תָּבׂז]] De 20:14, pl. [[יׇ֫בׂזּוּ]] Is 10:2 + 2 t.; [[וַיׇּ֫בׂזּוּ]] Ge 34:27 + 4 t.; sf. [[יְבָזּוּם]] Zep 2:9; 2 mpl. [[תָּבׂ֫זוּ]] Jos 8:2; 1 pl. cohort. [[נׇבׂ֫זׇה]] 1Sa 14:36 (cf. Ges:§ 67 R. 11); Imv. [[בּׂ֫זּוּ]] Na 2:10, Na 2:10; Inf. cstr. [[בּׂז]] Is 10:6 + 3 t.; [[בּוֹז]] Es 3:13, Es 8:11; Pt. act. pl. [[בּֽׂזְַַזִים]] Is 42:24, 2Ch 20:25; sf. [[בּֽׂזְַזַיִךְ]] Je 30:16, [[בּֽׂזְַזֵינוּ]] Is 17:14, [[בּֽׂזְַזֵיהֶם]] Ez Eze 39:10; pass. [[בָּזוּז]] Is 42:22; —spoil = take as spoil, c. acc. rei Nu 31:9, De 2:35 (c. [[לְ]] & refl. suff.) Je 20:5, Ez Eze 26:12, Na 2:10, Ps 109:11; oftener c. acc. cogn., [[בַּז]] Nu 31:32, Is 10:6 (‖[[שָׁלַל שָׁלָל]], as oft.) Is 33:23, Ez Eze 29:19, Eze 38:12, Eze 38:13; [[בִּזׇּה]] 2Ch 25:13; [[שָׁלָל]] De 3:7, De 20:14 (both sq. [[לְ]] c. refl. suff.) 2Ch 20:25, 2Ch 20:25, 2Ch 28:8, Es 3:13, Es 8:11; [[בהמה]] & [[שׁלל]] Jos 8:2, Jos 8:27, Jos 11:14 (all sq. [[לְ]] c. refl. suff.); obj. pers. carried off (cf. [[בַּז]]) Ge 34:29 (MT, but cf. Ol); plunder, despoil, c. acc. pers. robbed Is 10:2, Is 11:14, Is 17:14 ([[שׁסה]]) Is 42:22 (‖ id.) Zep 2:9, Je 30:16, Ez Eze 39:10, Eze 39:10; c. [[בָּהֶם]] (pers.) 1Sa 14:36; c. acc. of place plundered Ge 34:27, 2Ki 7:16, 2Ch 14:13; abs. Nu 31:53, Is 42:24. †

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[וְנׇבׂ֫זוּ]] consec. Am 3:11; Impf. 2 ms. [[תִּבּוֹז]] Is 24:3; Inf. abs. [[הִבּוֹז]] Is 24:3—be spoiled, plundered, subj. [[ארמנות]] Am 3:11; [[הארץ]] Is 24:3; [[הִבּוֹז תִּבּוֹז]] (‖[[הִבּוֹק תִּבּוֹק]]). †

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. [[וּבֻזׇּ֑זוּ]] consec. Je 50:37—be taken as spoil, subj. [[אוחרת]].
